places.name: Highland Glen Park
places.description: A fun park with a pond for fishing, walking trails, and picnic areas, with small park sets and restrooms.

places.name: Alpine Country Club
places.address: 4994 N Country Club Dr, Highland, UT 84003
places.description: This private golf course offers scenic views while you enjoy golfing.

places.name: Murdock Canal Trail
places.description: A paved trail where you can bike, run, and walk as you go past great views of the valley and the companies that call this place home.

places.name: Highland Splash Pad
places.description: This splash pad is perfect for fun times with the kids during the warmer summer months.

places.name: Dry Creek Trailhead
places.description: This trailhead runs past a small reservoir that you can fish at or just enjoy the views on a simple walk.

places.name: Heritage Park
places.description: This historic park offers a nice open area for activities with the kids, and a historic cabin from the pioneer era.

places.name: Timpanogos Cave
places.address: 2038 Alpine Loop Rd, American Fork, UT 84003
places.description: As one of Utah's great National Monuments, you can hike up to this beautiful cave with stunning stalagmites and stalactites.

places.name: Mountain Ridge Park
places.address: 5300 W Civic Center Dr, Highland, UT 84003
places.description: This new park is fun for all members of the family with sports fields, playgrounds, and plenty of open spaces.
